Module edu.citadel.cvm
Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast

Class Instruction

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.Instruction
Direct Known Subclasses:
InstructionNoArgs, InstructionOneArg
public abstract class Instruction extends AST
This abstract class implements common methods for the abstract syntax tree of a single assembly language instruction.

  • Method Details

    • initMaps

      public static void initMaps()
      Initialize static maps. These maps are shared with all instructions,but they must be re-initialized if the assembler is run on more than one file.

    • getLabels

      public List<Token> getLabels()

    • getOpCode

      public Token getOpCode()

    • setAddress

      public void setAddress(int address) throws ConstraintException
      Sets the memory address and defines label values for an instruction.
      Throws:
      ConstraintException

    • getAddress

      public int getAddress()
      Returns the address of this instruction.

    • defineIdAddress

      public void defineIdAddress(Token identifier, int size) throws ConstraintException
      Map the text of the identifier token to an address on the stack.
      Throws:
      ConstraintException

    • getIdAddress

      protected int getIdAddress(Token identifier)
      Returns the stack address associated with an identifier.

    • getArgSize

      protected abstract int getArgSize()
      Returns the number of bytes in memory occupied by the argument.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the number of bytes in memory occupied by the instruction, computed as 1 (for the opcode) plus the sizes of the operands.

    • checkLabels

      protected void checkLabels() throws ConstraintException
      Checks that each label has a value defined in the label map. This method should not be called for an instruction before method setAddress().
      Throws:
      ConstraintException - if the instruction has a label that is not defined in the label map.

    • getDisplacement

      protected int getDisplacement(Token labelArg)
      Calculates the displacement between an instruction's address and a label (computed as label's address - instruction's address). This method is used by branching and call instructions.

    • assertOpCode

      protected abstract void assertOpCode()
      Asserts that the opCode token of the instruction has the correct Symbol. Implemented in each instruction by calling the method assertOpCode(Symbol).

    • assertOpCode

      protected void assertOpCode(Symbol opCode)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
